title: How to Survive 2013 MULTi Steam-Rip-RG GameWorks
description:
::::::: RG GameWorks PRESENTS :::::::


:::: How to Survive 2013 MULTi Steam-Rip-RG GameWorks ::::


::Information::


Release date : October 23, 2013
Genre: Action / Adventure / Survival
Developer: 505 Games
Publisher: 505 Games
Platform: PC
Publication Type: License [Steam-Rip]
Language: English
Sound language: English
Tablet: Is present [deadmau5 / SKIDROW]


::Description::


An adventure game that tells about the hard life of people stranded 
on a deserted island. To survive, you need to look for the manual pages, 
weapons, food and shelter. To the aid of a unique in-game crafting system, 
allowing you to create hundreds of equipment and items.


::System Requirements::


OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better 
Memory: 4 GB RAM 
Graphics: ATi 5700 series/NVIDIA GeForce GT240 or equivalent
HDD: 9GB 
Network: Broadband Internet connection


::Installation Steps::


1) Install by running Setup.exe

2) Copy the contents of the folder NoDVD in the Main game folder.

3) Play.
